What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのとき、騒ぎを聞きつけた","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, having heard the commotion,"},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍が二体の魔物兵を連れて現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a demon general appeared, accompanied by two demon soldiers."},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、まさか！　ケイブリス様が死んだのか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no way! Demon Satera..."},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こ、降伏しろったって……","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-you say we should surrender..."},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな権限、俺には……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't have the authority to do that...\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、分かりやすく言ってやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, let me put it in terms you can understand.\""},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今すぐお前ら全員人間界から退かないなら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If all of you do not withdraw from the human world immediately...\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様を――殺すぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will—kill you!\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひえっ……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek...!?\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍が周りを見渡す。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon general looked around."},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場にいるのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Present there were,"},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦いに疲弊し、フラフラの人類軍。","translatedEnglishLine":"the human army, exhausted and staggering from the battle."},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、百戦錬磨の人類軍の精鋭。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, they were seasoned elite troops of the human army."},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物界のエリート、マエリータ隊。","translatedEnglishLine":"The elite Maelita squad of the demon realm."},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、絶対に敵うことのない魔人。","translatedEnglishLine":"And the demon lord whom no one could ever defeat."},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh..."},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ううううううう……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Uuuuuu...!\""},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"選択肢はなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was no choice."},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわぁぁあ！　誰か助けてくれーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah! Someone help me---!"},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリス様が殺されたぞーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Cavris has been killed------!\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍はまさに脱兎の如く駆けだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon general ran off like a startled rabbit."},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫か？　逃げられたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you alright? He got away.\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔物は強いボスの下でのみ団結できる種です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Demons are a species that can only unite under a strong boss.\""},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブリスが死に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With Cavris dead,"},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後を継ぐ者がいない時点で、","translatedEnglishLine":"and no successor to follow,"},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総崩れするだけです」","translatedEnglishLine":"they will simply fall apart completely.\""},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"「トップであるケイブリスの死は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The death of Cavris, the top leader,"},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに伝わり魔軍は人類圏から退くかと」","translatedEnglishLine":"will be soon communicated, and the demon army will withdraw from human territory.\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そか、それなら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, if that's the case...\""},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……じゃあ、その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um... well then, that is...\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、そうだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, yes...\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　ようやく終わったぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha! It's finally over!\""},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍総大将であるケイブリスの死は","translatedEnglishLine":"The death of Cavris, the supreme commander of the demon army,"},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"瞬く間に世界中に報じられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"was reported around the world in the blink of an eye."},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭を失った魔物に組織だった行動をすることは出来ず、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without their leader, the demons could not act in an organized manner,"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍という組織は自然と瓦解する。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the organization known as the demon army naturally fell apart."},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦意喪失した魔物兵は人間界から引き上げ、","translatedEnglishLine":"The demoralized demon soldiers withdrew from the human world,"},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうして、この長い戦いはようやく終わった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and with this, this long battle finally came to an end."},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍を統率していたケイブリスが戦死した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Cavris, who commanded the demon army, was killed in battle."},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"これにより各地を蹂躙する圧倒的な力を持っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of this, the overwhelming force that had ravaged many areas"},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は次々と降参した。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army surrendered one after another."},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"血の山河が作られた地獄絵図は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The hellish scene where rivers and mountains of blood were created,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍総大将であるケイブリスの死は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The death of Cavris, the supreme commander of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瞬く間に世界中に報じられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was reported around the world in the blink of an eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭を失った魔物に組織だった行動をすることは出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without their leader, the demons could not act in an organized manner,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍という組織は自然と瓦解する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the organization known as the demon army naturally fell apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦意喪失した魔物兵は人間界から引き上げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demoralized demon soldiers withdrew from the human world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、この長い戦いはようやく終わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with this, this long battle finally came to an end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだこれは！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what is this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、騒ぎを聞きつけた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, having heard the commotion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が二体の魔物兵を連れて現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a demon general appeared, accompanied by two demon soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、まさか！　ケイブリス様が死んだのか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no way! Has Lord Cavris died!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あ、あ、あのケイブリス様が！？"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-that Cavris himself!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前達のボスは死んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your boss is dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々の勝ちだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have won.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと降参しろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surrender quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いでボロボロとなったサテラが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, battered from the battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できる限り威圧的に命じる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gave her command as forcefully as she could.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひえっ、魔人サテラ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek... Demon Satera...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こ、降伏しろったって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-you say we should surrender...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな権限、俺には……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't have the authority to do that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、分かりやすく言ってやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, let me put it in terms you can understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今すぐお前ら全員人間界から退かないなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If all of you do not withdraw from the human world immediately..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様を――殺すぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will—kill you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が周りを見渡す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general looked around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にいるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Present there were,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いに疲弊し、フラフラの人類軍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the human army, exhausted and staggering from the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、百戦錬磨の人類軍の精鋭。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, they were seasoned elite troops of the human army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界のエリート、マエリータ隊。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The elite Maelita squad of the demon realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、絶対に敵うことのない魔人。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the demon lord whom no one could ever defeat.
"Ugh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ううううううう……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uuuuuu...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択肢はなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no choice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわぁぁあ！　誰か助けてくれーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaah! Someone help me---!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様が殺されたぞーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Cavris has been killed------!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍はまさに脱兎の如く駆けだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general ran off like a startled rabbit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大丈夫か？　逃げられたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you alright? He got away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物は強いボスの下でのみ団結できる種です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demons are a species that can only unite under a strong boss."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスが死に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With Cavris dead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後を継ぐ者がいない時点で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and no successor to follow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総崩れするだけです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they will simply fall apart completely."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トップであるケイブリスの死は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The death of Cavris, the top leader,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに伝わり魔軍は人類圏から退くかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be soon communicated, and the demon army will withdraw from human territory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そか、それなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, if that's the case..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの……じゃあ、その……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-um... well then, that is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、そうだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, yes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　ようやく終わったぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha! It's finally over!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍総大将であるケイブリスの死は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The death of Cavris, the supreme commander of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瞬く間に世界中に報じられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was reported around the world in the blink of an eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭を失った魔物に組織だった行動をすることは出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without their leader, the demons could not act in an organized manner,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍という組織は自然と瓦解する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the organization known as the demon army naturally fell apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦意喪失した魔物兵は人間界から引き上げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demoralized demon soldiers withdrew from the human world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、この長い戦いはようやく終わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with this, this long battle finally came to an end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を統率していたケイブリスが戦死した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavris, who commanded the demon army, was killed in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより各地を蹂躙する圧倒的な力を持っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, the overwhelming force that had ravaged many areas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は次々と降参した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army surrendered one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 血の山河が作られた地獄絵図は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hellish scene where rivers and mountains of blood were created,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍総大将であるケイブリスの死は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The death of Cavris, the supreme commander of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瞬く間に世界中に報じられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was reported around the world in the blink of an eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭を失った魔物に組織だった行動をすることは出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without their leader, the demons could not act in an organized manner,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍という組織は自然と瓦解する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the organization known as the demon army naturally fell apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦意喪失した魔物兵は人間界から引き上げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demoralized demon soldiers withdrew from the human world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、この長い戦いはようやく終わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with this, this long battle finally came to an end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだこれは！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what is this!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、騒ぎを聞きつけた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, having heard the commotion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が二体の魔物兵を連れて現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a demon general appeared, accompanied by two demon soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、まさか！　ケイブリス様が死んだのか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no way! Has Lord Cavris died!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、あ、あ、あのケイブリス様が！？"
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-that Cavris himself!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前達のボスは死んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Your boss is dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々の勝ちだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have won.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと降参しろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Surrender quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いでボロボロとなったサテラが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, battered from the battle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できる限り威圧的に命じる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gave her command as forcefully as she could.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひえっ、魔人サテラ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek... Demon Satera...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こ、降伏しろったって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-you say we should surrender...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな権限、俺には……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't have the authority to do that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、分かりやすく言ってやる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, let me put it in terms you can understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今すぐお前ら全員人間界から退かないなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If all of you do not withdraw from the human world immediately..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様を――殺すぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I will—kill you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が周りを見渡す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general looked around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にいるのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Present there were,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いに疲弊し、フラフラの人類軍。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the human army, exhausted and staggering from the battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、百戦錬磨の人類軍の精鋭。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, they were seasoned elite troops of the human army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界のエリート、マエリータ隊。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The elite Maelita squad of the demon realm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、絶対に敵うことのない魔人。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the demon lord whom no one could ever defeat.
"Ugh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ううううううう……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uuuuuu...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択肢はなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no choice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわぁぁあ！　誰か助けてくれーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Waaah! Someone help me---!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様が殺されたぞーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Cavris has been killed------!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍はまさに脱兎の如く駆けだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general ran off like a startled rabbit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大丈夫か？　逃げられたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you alright? He got away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物は強いボスの下でのみ団結できる種です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demons are a species that can only unite under a strong boss."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスが死に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With Cavris dead,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後を継ぐ者がいない時点で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and no successor to follow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総崩れするだけです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they will simply fall apart completely."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トップであるケイブリスの死は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The death of Cavris, the top leader,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに伝わり魔軍は人類圏から退くかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be soon communicated, and the demon army will withdraw from human territory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そか、それなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, if that's the case..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あの……じゃあ、その……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-um... well then, that is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、そうだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, yes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　ようやく終わったぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha! It's finally over!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍総大将であるケイブリスの死は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The death of Cavris, the supreme commander of the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 瞬く間に世界中に報じられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was reported around the world in the blink of an eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭を失った魔物に組織だった行動をすることは出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without their leader, the demons could not act in an organized manner,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍という組織は自然と瓦解する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the organization known as the demon army naturally fell apart.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦意喪失した魔物兵は人間界から引き上げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demoralized demon soldiers withdrew from the human world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、この長い戦いはようやく終わった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and with this, this long battle finally came to an end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を統率していたケイブリスが戦死した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavris, who commanded the demon army, was killed in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより各地を蹂躙する圧倒的な力を持っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, the overwhelming force that had ravaged many areas

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は次々と降参した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army surrendered one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 血の山河が作られた地獄絵図は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hellish scene where rivers and mountains of blood were created,
